EmailTemplate.description: Alert to CS Billing Queue that there is a new case.
EmailTemplate.name: New Billing Case
EmailTemplate.subject: New Billing Case In Queue
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Billing Team,
There is a new case in the Billing Queue. You can access the case below.
Case Description:
{!Case.Description}
Case Link:
{!Case.Link}
Thank you!
